name: %LOCATION_NAME
description: %LOCATION_NAME is a massive temple, around which a large village has been created. As %PERSON_NAME enters, they shudder, feeling the presence of hostile divine powers, a sense of blinding, burning light, shining on a soul which had long since turned its back on it.
